age.description: The age of the individual in years.

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the individual.

asa_status_pre_op2.description: Pre-operative ASA score: 1 - Normal healthy patient, 2 - Patient with mild systemic disease, 3 - Patient with severe systemic disease, 4 - Patient with severe systemic disease that is a constant threat to life, 5 - Moribund patient who is not expected to survive without the operation.

angina_within_30_days_prior_to_s.description: Occurrence of angina within 30 days prior to surgery.

pulse_rate_per_min_pre_op.description: Pulse rate per minute before surgery.
